# Exciting News: Conquer the Hill 2024 is Here! ![🌄](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f304/72.png){alt="🌄" width="26"}

We are thrilled to officially announce the launch of Conquer the Hill, an annual community event where we come together to walk up Tumamoc Hill as a symbol of healing, growth, and overcoming life’s challenges. Whether you’ve faced trauma, domestic violence, PTSD, homelessness, or mental health struggles, this event is a chance to rise above it all—together.

### ![🗓](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f5d3/72.png){alt="🗓" width="22"} Date: November 3, 2024

### ![📍](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f4cd/72.png){alt="📍" width="18"} Location: Tumamoc Hill, Tucson, AZ

<br>

## How the Event Will Run This Year:

After our walk up Tumamoc Hill, we will gather at a separate venue to be determined, where we’ll enjoy light food and beverages and listen to inspiring speakers share their stories of hope, resilience, and resources for moving forward. Stay tuned for the venue details!

### ![💻](https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f4bb/72.png){.normal alt="💻" width="18"} Register Now:

Although this is a FREE event, please sign up through Eventbrite (link below) so we can get an accurate headcount and make sure we’re prepared for everyone! Let’s make this year the best yet!

::: {style="text-align: center;"}
<a href="https://www.eventbrite.com/e/conquer-the-hill-2024-tickets-1025589364397gc" class="button" target="_blank"> Eventbrite Link</a>
:::
